There will be an erlounge at ***some place*** on ***some date***.

The speaker will be ***some distinguished Erlang bod*** and they will be talking about ***some important technology***.

It will start at ***some time*** and there will be ***some comestibles***.

Afterwards we will ***go/stagger/flee (delete as appropriate)*** to ***some howff*** for drinks.

Please sign up if you are thinking of attending so we can get an idea of numbers.

Cheers

Your Erlounge Team
